title: Nursing Collaboration Problem-Solving Strategies Through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory and Understanding of Clinical Practice
context.additional_context: Establishment of real-time/asynchronous collaborative learning environments using digital devices, with complex problem-solving scenarios mirroring clinical settings.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to integrate and analyze diverse perspectives from multidisciplinary teams using online collaboration tools.
Learners design collaborative processes to solve unstructured clinical problems by applying structured discussion strategies.
Learners reflect on and improve their decision-making processes based on peer feedback in a digital platform
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
